channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Public release of Epstein records puts Maxwell under fresh scrutiny amid her claims of innocence
item.description: British socialite and onetime Jeffrey Epstein girlfriend Ghislaine Maxwell is back in the spotlight with the public release of investigative records that led to her 2021 sex trafficking conviction.

item.title: New storm hitting waterlogged Southern California could cause more flooding and mudslides
Virtual reality opens doors for older people to build closer connections in real life
